t: The Glories of the City of God
A Psalm of the sons of Korah. A Song.
His*pn foundation is*i in the holy mountains.
The*ld Lord*s loves the gates of Zion More*ld than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious*ld things are spoken of you, O*ld city of God! Selah*ipg
“I*pn will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to those who know Me; Behold,*ld O Philistia and Tyre, with Ethiopia: ‘This*ld one*i was born there.’”
And*ln of Zion it will be said, “This*ld one*i and that one*i were born in her; And*ld the Most High Himself shall establish her.”
The*ld Lord*s will record, When*ld He registers the peoples: “This*ld one*i was born there.” Selah*ipg
Both*pn the singers and the players on instruments say,*i “All*ld my springs are*i in you.”
